edu.ncsu.csc216.simulation.actor

Class Animal

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.simulation.actor.Animal
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PredatorPrey, PurePredator, PurePrey

    public abstract class Animal
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that contains behavior for all the types of animals. PurePredator, PurePrey, and PredatorPrey extend Animal.
    Author:
    NBoar

      Indicates whether or not an animal is disabled for the coming step

      • breed

        protected boolean breed(Location l,
                        EcoGrid e)
        Parent animal looks for empty cells around it starting west and looking clockwise. Pops an infant into the first empty cell.
        Parameters:
        l - The location of the parent.
        e - The ecosystem to make babies in.
        Returns:
        True if the animal has bred, false if it failed.

      • move

        protected void move(Location location,
                    EcoGrid e)
        Animal scouts the locations around it and moves to the first empty one.
        Parameters:
        location - The current location of the animal
        e - The Ecosystem to interact with

      • eat

        protected boolean eat(Location l,
                      EcoGrid e)
        Eating behavior. Animal looks around it for prey and eats if the rank is lower.
        Parameters:
        l - The animal's location.
        e - Ecosystem that the animal is in.
        Returns:
        True if the animal ate, false if it did not eat.

        public abstract java.awt.Color getColor()

        Color The animal's color.

      • act

        public abstract void act(Location l,
                         EcoGrid e)
        An animal acts according it the behavior of its type.
        Parameters:
        l - The location of the animal that will act.
        e - The ecosystem containing the animal.

      • pastBreedTime

        protected abstract boolean pastBreedTime(int i)
        Compares a given time to pastBreedTime.
        Parameters:
        i - The amount of time to compare to pastBreedTime.
        Returns:
        True if it is past breed time, false if it is not.

      • makeNewBaby

        protected abstract Animal makeNewBaby()
        Creates a wonderful little miracle from the parent's type.
        Returns:
        Animal A new animal of the same type as the parent.
